about_the_game:
Free-to-Play Social MMO

Piffsy is a Social MMO developed by a small indie team in their spare time! It provides a completely Free-to-Play experience, offering a wide range of activities for you to engage in. You can explore, play, create, and connect with other players in a fresh and expansive massively multiplayer open world.


Solo or Team Adventures


Whether you prefer solo adventures or teaming up with friends for an even more thrilling experience, Piffsy has you covered. You can socialize with fellow players through both Text and Voice Chat, or embark on exciting loot-collecting quests together, sharing the rewards with your party.


Explore Faster with Mounts


If you're in a hurry, grab a mount to explore the world more quickly. Compete for the top spot on leaderboards in various mini-games scattered throughout the game.


Customize Your Avatar


Our goal is to accommodate all player preferences. Whether you enjoy customizing your Avatar with an extensive selection of fashion styles or helping others through our Mentors Programme, we've got something for you.


Real Estate and Decoration


If you have a passion for real estate, take advantage of your free apartment and decorate it to your heart's content. Whether you're a budding fashion enthusiast or an experienced architect, we invite you to support us and create your virtual haven.
